statements: SELECT * FROM online_assessment;
SELECT assessment_name, score, completion_date FROM online_assessment;
SELECT * FROM online_assessment WHERE score > 80;
SELECT assessment_id, completion_date FROM online_assessment WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_name FROM online_assessment ORDER BY assessment_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM online_assessment WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM online_assessment WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, score, completion_date FROM online_assessment WHERE assessment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY score ASC, completion_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT completion_date FROM online_assessment WHERE assessment_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, score FROM online_assessment WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY assessment_name ASC, score DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, learner_id, score FROM assessments ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, total_questions, duration_minutes FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions > 10;
SELECT learner_id, quiz_id, score FROM assessments WHERE score BETWEEN 80 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY score DESC, id ASC
SELECT quiz_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM assessments GROUP BY quiz_id
SELECT * FROM assessments JOIN quizzes ON assessments.quiz_id = quizzes.id
SELECT quiz_name, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE duration_minutes > 30
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE learner_id = 5 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM learners
SELECT name, age FROM learners
SELECT email FROM learners WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, registration_date FROM learners ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE score > 90
SELECT * FROM learners;
SELECT name, age FROM learners WHERE age > 25;
SELECT learner_id, name, email FROM learners ORDER BY learner_id DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, MAX(score) FROM assessments GROUP BY assessment_id;
SELECT q.question_id, q.question_text, a.score FROM questions q INNER JOIN assessments a ON q.assessment_id = a.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_title, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_title DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, course_id FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, score FROM students JOIN quiz_results ON students.student_id = quiz_results.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_title = 'Math';
SELECT quiz_title, course_title FROM quizzes JOIN courses ON quizzes.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_title, score FROM students JOIN quiz_results ON students.student_id = quiz_results.student_id JOIN quizzes ON quiz_results.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id;
SELECT student_name, quiz_title, score FROM students JOIN quiz_results ON students.student_id = quiz_results.student_id JOIN quizzes ON quiz_results.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners;
SELECT learner_name, email_address FROM AdultLearners WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_description FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_time_limit < 60;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM Questions WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT learner_name, marks_obtained FROM AdultLearners JOIN Results ON AdultLearners.learner_id = Results.learner_id;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners WHERE learner_id = 1;
SELECT learner_name, email_address FROM AdultLearners WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_description FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_time_limit < 60;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM Questions WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT learner_name, marks_obtained FROM AdultLearners INNER JOIN Results ON AdultLearners.learner_id = Results.learner_id WHERE Results.quiz_id = 2;
